## GRIN Germplasm 

Total Number of Accessions in GRIN genebank: [N=13,131](../page/accession/index.html)

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(data.table)
d <- fread("~/Documents/Github/ZeaBigData/data/export_2017_02_07_03_48_11.csv", data.table=FALSE)
#names(d)

out <- as.data.frame(table(d$Origin))
out <- subset(out, Var1 != "")

library("googleVis")
Geo=gvisGeoChart(out, locationvar="Var1",  colorvar="Freq",
                 options=list(projection="kavrayskiy-vii"))
plot(Geo)

```
